mapper.update: update `t_custom` set telephone = #{telephone}, custome_name = #{customeName}, gender = #{gender}, state = #{state}, picture_url = #{pictureUrl}, regist_time = #{registTime}, regist_channel = #{registChannel}, telephone_ascription = #{telephoneAscription}, tianyi_id = #{tianyiId}, qq_id = #{qqId}, weixin_id = #{weixinId}, alipay_id = #{alipayId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, telephone, custome_name, gender, state, picture_url, regist_time, regist_channel, telephone_ascription, tianyi_id, qq_id, weixin_id, alipay_id from `t_custom` where id = #{id}
select id, telephone, custome_name, gender, state, picture_url, regist_time, regist_channel, telephone_ascription, tianyi_id, qq_id, weixin_id, alipay_id from `t_custom`
